short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to hide a single Jira announcement without hiding all of them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension checks if you're currently on any Jira instance and if an announcement is currently being displayed. If that's the case, a close button is shown and clicking on it hides the announcement immediately and on any further page loads. Because the extension checks the contents of any announcement, any further annoucements with a different content will still be displayed, as they might be of note to you.

Source code:
https://gitlab.com/dpeukert/hide-jira-announcements

Changelog:
1.0.1 - 2023/12/09 - updated close button style
1.0.0 - 2022/04/11 - initial version
